Enumeration Type Documentation

enum RODFDetectorType

Numerical representation of different detector types.

Enumerator:
TYPE_NOT_DEFINED 

A not yet defined detector.

DISCARDED_DETECTOR 

A detector which had to be discarded (!!!).

BETWEEN_DETECTOR 

An in-between detector.

SOURCE_DETECTOR 

A source detector.

SINK_DETECTOR
